vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀκρᾰσ-ία,
Ionic dialect ἀκρᾰ-σίη,
__B ={ἀκράτεια}, [NT+7th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: intemperance, self-indulgence, Mt. 23:25; unruly appetite, lustfulness, lack of self-control 1Cor. 7:5*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: complacencia  falta de dominio de sí mismo
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 缺乏自我控制, 自我耽溺(太 23:25; 林前 7:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 缺乏自我控制, 自我耽溺(太 23:25; 林前 7:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: thiếu tự chủ; không kiểm soát; không điều độ ; quá độ
